attributes.action: Provide WOMEN ONLY leisure facilities for millions of overweight shy women
attributes.additional_details:
Millions of women are put off gym because of how others see them {mainly men} 

 http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-2815893/Scared-judged-gym-not-New-study-finds-75-women-want-exercise-don-t-fear-think.html
attributes.background: In the UK there are millions of over weight women who DONT go gym or partake in leisure facilities as they feel embarrassed of the way they look in front of men. These women need to be helped.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't directly responsible for providing leisure facilities. Leisure facilities are provided by local councils and private providers. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition calling for councils to be required by law to provide women-only exercise facilities.
